content: this textured crochet cat blanket is perfect for covering your kitty s favorite nap spot or for donating to an animal shelter includes a video tutorial for the basketweave stitch > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 1 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting flat in row crocheting in the round working single_crochet around your project crocheting over yarn tails includes video tutorials special stitch patterns bpdc fpdc includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** small 22 5 57 cm width x 20 51 cm height **materials** king cole pricewise dk 2 yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 308 yds/282 m 3 skeins each in 3496 ferret and 1745 caramel *or approximately 750 yds 686 m in any light weight easy care yarn * us size j-10 6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle **gauge** 14 sts = 4 10 cm across in pattern for row 3-4 while holding 1 strand of each yarn together *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/14/basketweave-crochet-cat-blanket-pattern/ 2 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/king-cole-pricewise-dk utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=35c8ae00
